title: Tuscan-Style Italian Sausage
ingredients: ['1.75kg coarse minced pork shoulder', '450g coarse minced pork back fat', '2 tablespoons salt', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons coarsely ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '3/4 teaspoon ground mace', '1/2 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/4 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '125ml ice water', '2 metres sausage casing, 3cm wide']
